DataElement.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Total Lung Capacity Measurement Finding Status Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the status of the pulmonary function test results for the total lung capacity measurement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Total Lung Capacity Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood._The total volume of air in the lungs after maximum inhalation._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
